Plot: Teenager Nancy Thompson must uncover the dark truth concealed by her parents after she and her friends become targets of the spirit of a serial killer with a bladed glove in their dreams, in which if they die, it kills them in real l

Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
Writer: Wesley Strick, Eric Heisserer, Wes Craven
Actors: Jackie Earle Haley, Rooney Mara, Kyle Gallner
Plot: The spectre of a disfigured man haunts the children of the parents who murdered him, stalking and killing them in their dreams.

Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
Writer: Wes Craven, Bruce Wagner, Frank Darabont
Actors: Heather Langenkamp, Robert Englund, Craig Wasson
Plot: A psychiatrist familiar with knife-wielding dream demon Freddy Krueger helps teens at a mental hospital battle the killer who is invading their dreams.

Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy's Revenge
Writer: David Chaskin, Wes Craven
Actors: Robert Englund, Mark Patton, Kim Myers
Plot: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by deceased child murderer Freddy Krueger, who is out to possess him in order to continue his reign of terror in the real world.

Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
Writer: Wes Craven, William Kotzwinkle, Brian Helgeland
Actors: Robert Englund, Rodney Eastman, John Beckman
Plot: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may be able to defeat him for good.

Title: Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare
Writer: Wes Craven, Rachel Talalay, Michael De Luca
Actors: Robert Englund, Lisa Zane, Shon Greenblatt
Plot: Dream-haunting Freddy Krueger returns once again to prowl the nightmares of Springwood's last surviving teenager, and of a woman whose personal connection to Krueger may mean his doom.

Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 5: The Dream Child
Writer: Wes Craven, John Skipp, Craig Spector
Actors: Robert Englund, Lisa Wilcox, Kelly Jo Minter
Plot: The pregnant Alice finds Freddy Krueger striking through the sleeping mind of her unborn child, hoping to be reborn into the real world.

Title: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf
Writer: Beau DeMayo, Andrzej Sapkowski
Actors: Theo James, Mary McDonnell, Lara Pulver
Plot: Escaping from poverty to become a witcher, Vesemir slays monsters for coin and glory, but when a new menace rises, he must face the demons of his past.
